article_title: Israeli strikes on Gaza may have violated laws of war - UN report
sentence: The  Israeli  military  launched  a  campaign  to  destroy  the  Palestinian  armed  group  in  response  to  an  unprecedented  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  during  which  about  1,200  people  -  mostly  civilians  -  were  killed  and  251  others  were  taken  hostage.
